name: Bareilly Ki Barfi
review:
A fantastically written script that flourishes under the direction of Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari. After Nil Battey Sannata last year, she once again showcases her direction class. All the actors were superb in their characters including their highly entertaining dialogue delivery. A special mention to Rajkummar Rao who got an amazing chance and wonderfully delivered his method acting.

Storyline Rating: 4

Acting Rating: 3
Rajkummar Rao: 4
Kriti Sanon: 3
Ayushmann Khurrana: 3
Pankaj Tripathy: 3
Seema Pahwa: 3

Direction Rating: 4

Music Rating: 2

Cinematography: 3

Editing: 3
